quote: Growth begins where comfort ends.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Consistency transforms small steps into success.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Fear is temporary, courage is forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Every action you take is a vote for the person you wish to become.
author: James Clear

quote: The strongest minds are shaped in the quietest storms.
author: Socrates

quote: You don't have to be perfect, just brave.
author: Brené Brown

quote: Success favors the focused.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Dreams don't work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Progress, not perfection, creates change.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: Discipline is choosing what you want most over what you want now.
author: Craig Groeschel

quote: Believe in your journey, even when the path isn’t clear.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Courage isn't the absence of fear, but moving forward in spite of it.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Clarity comes from action, not thought.
author: Marie Forleo

quote: Don't wish for it. Work for it.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Keep going. Your future self will thank you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Start small. Think big. Move fast.
author: Seth Godin

quote: Energy flows where attention goes.
author: Rhonda Byrne

quote: Take the risk or lose the chance.
author: Unknown

quote: Your mindset determines your reality.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Direction is more important than speed.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: Be bold enough to begin, strong enough to finish.
author: Mel Robbins

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Comfort is the enemy of achievement.
author: Grant Cardone

quote: Every day is a fresh start. Use it wisely.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Fall seven times, rise eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Turn setbacks into stepping stones.
author: Les Brown

quote: Action cures fear.
author: David J. Schwartz

quote: Don't be busy, be productive.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Winners train, losers complain.
author: Eric Thomas
